sentences.english: You have only to look at his balance sheet to see that.

sentences.english: Are you as well - spoken as the off-the-cuff pundit?
sentences.chinese: 你能如同学者般侃侃而谈吗？

sentences.english: He speaks volubly like a flowing river; many people are attracted to stop and listen.
sentences.chinese: 他口若悬河，侃侃而谈，吸引了不少人听。

sentences.english: Sitting in the student guidance office, Sun Ta-wha chatted amiably with her guests for an afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 坐在学生辅导室的孙老师，陪访客侃侃而谈一个下午。

sentences.english: Perhaps you're already speaking up in team meetings and getting your ideas across effectively.
sentences.chinese: 或许你在团队会议上，可以就自己的论点侃侃而谈。

sentences.english: Husband 8 was a psychologist; all he ever did was talk about it.
sentences.chinese: 第八任是一个心理学家，他所能做的事就是侃侃而谈。
